extendedInfo.description: One man, no man? What about the robot armed with onboard replicator?This is a three-dimensional story of the scout drone adventures. Yeah, the adventures are painted in sci-fi colors and filled by energy beams, plasma bolts and overheated weapons. Our cybernetic hero will have to face a horde of extremely evil aliens. Of course, if all creatures in the Universe were kind and friendly - anything similar wouldn't happen. :)iDaTank is the first and, I hope, not last indie release 'wink' 'wink' A bit of vital information:- More than twenty five levels (exactly twenty six).- More than twenty various types of alien fauna.- More than fifty perks and modifications. (exactly fifty one).- Up to five upgradable weapons.- This game works only in landscape mode.- This game has three optional controller types.Please, check the options and choose controller you like.PRESS QUOTES"Despite the ambiguous name, iDaTank is a surprisingly in-depth adventure game with a thin, but adequate layer of RPG elements added on top to keep you coming back for more. Like the best rogue-likes, it works like crack in that you'll manage to inch further and further into space through each playthrough before suddenly realizing it's three in the morning." - Thorin Klosowski, Touch Arcade (4/5)"This game is what AppaSnap was created for. This is a really quirky little game that is not mainstream, but appears to have enough depth to keep you coming back. It is slightly difficult to understand precisely what's going on at the beginning and the tutorial could be much easier to use, but stick with it and you'll find a brilliant little game in here. We like this!" - Appa Snap (9/10)"iDaTank pulls together some great mechanics and blends them in an interesting way. The levels and enemies keep things interesting and the leveling up and upgradable weapons will keep players engaged. The game is much deeper than it seems at first glance and players will be pleasantly surprised." - Jason Wadsworth, 148 Apps (3.5/5.0)âAbout Updateâ12. 01. 09- weapon upgrade indicator previous lite version bug fix- start new game confirmation previous version bug fix - rollback from ARMv7 to ARMv6- rollback from OpenGL ES 2.0 to OpenGL ES 1.x with VFP

reviews.title: One of my favorite games
reviews.comment: But sadly when you run out off clones then you have to start the game from beginning no matter how far you got! Really add checkpoints or at least we should be able to start new game with like half the money we got last time. Otherwise, can\'t put this game down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nice design, graphics and runs very smooth!  Menus and gameplay seems a bit confusing at first but when you figure it out, it\'s no problem at all. Check out alternative controls in settings.  The only difference between free and paid version is that you can\'t earn extra lives. It\'s essential because levels get harder and harder. The only downside is that if you decide to get a paid version, you\'re gonna have to play from the begging.
reviews.author: Oleg Naumov

reviews.title: Cute and \302\253alright\302\273
reviews.comment: The graphic\'s great, the controls are working good, no lagging and easy to learn. As another reviewer said, it\'s a \"serene\" game. I\'ll add arkadish and cutie monsters. It will keep many a person pinned to their phone, playing, but I think it\'s too repetitious (but that\'s why people play these games, isn\'t it?). Try for yourself\342\200\224it\'s a free demo!
reviews.author: Sam Ferdinand

reviews.title: Okay....
reviews.comment: This is an okay game to play whilst passing time, but the interfacing is difficult to understand. I don\'t really see the point of the game, either, and I can\'t see myself playing it for more than half an hour without getting bored. Slightly disappointed with it.
reviews.author: Elina Ahmed

reviews.title: Interesting...
reviews.comment: And I enjoyed the training mission...but I found the menus too difficult to navigate and understand
reviews.author: Martin Whitehouse

reviews.comment: Really Like this game, I\'ll buy it.. Developers good Job by creating this amazing app\tLOVED IT

reviews.title: Control could be better
reviews.comment: Really nice game with great visual. My problem is that the joy pad doesn\'t function like others game which is when I slide my finger to far the tank stop moving unexpectedly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweeet cx
reviews.comment: A game I can\'t put down cx such good graphics, doesn\'t lag. I WANT the full version since you run out of lives and start from the beggining love itt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: This game is very cool, cute, and awsome. Very well thought out, i have no problems with it, i never say \'\'I wish\'\' with this game, feels proffesionally made. Doesn\'t lag or anything and my phone has 512mb of RAM, I love this little game, will defo buy the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User
